subtasks.name: Define Themes
subtasks.description: Identify and outline the main themes of the story to ensure a coherent message and engaging narrative.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of main themes with brief descriptions.

subtasks.name: Develop Characters
subtasks.description: Create profiles for the main characters, including the protagonist, antagonist, and supporting characters, detailing their motivations, backgrounds, and relationships.
subtasks.expected_output: Character profiles for each main character.

subtasks.name: Establish Settings
subtasks.description: Determine the time and place for the story, outlining how the setting influences the plot and character dynamics.
subtasks.expected_output: A detailed description of the primary setting(s) used in the story.

subtasks.name: Define Purpose
subtasks.description: Clarify the story's purpose, determining what message or experience is intended for the audience and how it will shape the narrative.
subtasks.expected_output: A statement outlining the purpose of the story.
